A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While the action sequences were exciting and the visuals were stunning\, I cannot over look how much the story was damaged beyond repair. Forget any back story that was teased with episode 7\, throw all the history  away and forget true Good vs Evil\, too many real world references and unnatural forced humor\, I have loved all star wars movies until this point and I am truly not looking forward to the next one. Shame...
